description:
This is “Nanba Prison,” the large impregnable prison somewhere in the territorial waters of Japan. On this night, 4 inmates recklessly attempt to escape from the world’s best prison guards and security. Jyugo, who wears mysterious shackles. Uno, a self-proclaimed ladies’ man.  Niko, an otaku who’s prone to illness.Rock, a foodie gang member.
Can the inmates of Building 13, Cell 13 pass security and reach outside of prison in one piece?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ナンバーのついたバカたち!
